text: Mathew James Willis (born 8 May 1983), also previously known as Mattie Jay, is an English singer-songwriter, television presenter and actor. He is best known as the bassist and the Co-Vocalists of the pop punk band, Busted. Willis released his debut solo album Don't Let It Go to Waste on 20 November 2006. In 2012, he married BBC television personality Emma Griffiths. They have three children. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:English pop singers Category:English pop musicians Category:English rock guitarists Category:English rock singers Category:English television presenters Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from London Category:Musicians from London Category:Television personalities from London Category:Singer-songwriters from London
title: Matt Willis
